title: 9 Fluffy Yogurt Pancake Recipes
description: Make a stack of yogurt pancakes with your favorite Greek yogurt, plain yogurt, or flavored yogurt for a deliciously easy breakfast any day of the week. Find our best recipes for healthy yogurt pancakes, including Greek yogurt pancakes, low-fat yogurt pancakes, healthy wholegrain yogurt pancakes, and more.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE 9 Fluffy Yogurt Pancake Recipes By Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt Ita Mac Airt is a longtime member of the Allrecipes Editorial team, starting in the original Seattle headquarters as one of the site's first content producers. She went on to manage several of Allrecipes' international websites before rejoining the Allrecipes.com editorial team in 2023. Allrecipes' editorial guidelines Published on March 30, 2021 Close Credits: lutzflcat Whip up a stack of soft and fluffy yogurt pancakes for breakfast or brunch using one of these easy recipes. Using yogurt in pancakes is a great alternative to buttermilk, especially considering many of us always have a tub of yogurt at the ready in the fridge. From apple pancakes made with low-fat plain yogurt to Greek yogurt pancakes with blueberry and lemon — these pancake recipes are packed with protein and flavor, making a healthy and delicious start to any day! 01 of 10 Greek Yogurt Pancakes View Recipe Save Greek yogurt adds a tangy flavor and soft texture to pancakes. Give this recipe a go and have fluffy pancakes on the table in just 15 minutes! Serve the pancakes warm with any leftover yogurt and a fruit compote for a special brunch dish. 02 of 10 Blueberry Almond Pancakes View Recipe Save Yogurt and almond extract are the secret ingredients in this 5 star fresh blueberry pancake recipe. "I used Greek yogurt and it gave a nice tart taste to the pancakes," says home cook Brianna. "Super easy recipe to follow. I will make these pancakes again!" 03 of 10 Apple Yogurt Pancakes View Recipe Save Seattle2Sydney These hearty apple pancakes are naturally sweet but deserve to be served with a generous drizzle of maple syrup for a warming morning treat! Double the recipe, and cook and freeze leftover pancakes for an easy breakfast another day. 04 of 10 Multigrain Pancakes View Recipe Save With a slightly nutty flavor, these fluffy ground almond and low-fat yogurt pancakes are easy to make. Mix in some mashed banana instead of sugar for natural sweetness; top with coconut flakes, blueberries, and maple syrup for a filling and flavorful breakfast or brunch. 05 of 10 Carrot Cake Greek Yogurt Pancakes View Recipe Save These protein-packed oat and grated carrot pancakes are made with Greek yogurt and flavored with cinnamon, nutmeg and ginger. Try sprinkling raisins on top while cooking the first side for even more carrot cake-like pancakes! 06 of 10 Fluffy Greek Yogurt Pancakes View Recipe Save Recipe creator Jessie Crosby made these pancakes after running out of milk and using Greek yogurt instead, but they're so delicious they deserved their own recipe! 07 of 10 Blueberry Pancakes View Recipe Save Tricia Hendrix The secret to these fluffy blueberry pancakes is — you guessed it — yogurt! The recipe calls for both milk and yogurt, but you could easily use all yogurt for added texture and flavor. 08 of 10 Greek Yogurt Blueberry Lemon Pancakes View Recipe Save Lemon and blueberries are a natural pairing in these pancakes made with protein-packed Greek yogurt and almond milk. Add a few tablespoons of ground flax seed for a nuttier flavor and a boost of fiber to your breakfast or brunch. 09 of 10 Strawberry Oat Chocolate Chip Greek Yogurt Pancakes View Recipe Save No need to wait for an indulgent weekend brunch to enjoy pancakes! These fruity pancakes are naturally sweetened with strawberries and applesauce and full of oats to keep you going till lunchtime. Whiz the batter up in a blender in no time. 10 of 10 More Inspiration Lela Looking for more ways to use up that tub of yogurt? Or maybe you just want all the pancakes? Either way, we've got you covered! Pictured: Greek Yogurt Poppy Seed Muffins Our Best Yogurt Cake Recipes All Pancake Recipes Explore more: Recipes Breakfast and Brunch Pancake Recipes Was this page helpful? Thanks for your feedback!
